CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 25, 1962, pg. 19, reads: "The Vanishing 'Bums' - Posing for The Courier in their dressing room at Forbes Field, last week, just before ending a five-game tailspin, were these six survivors of the famed heroes who brought glory to Brooklyn and a least a million Negro fans, coast to coast, since 1947. Seated, from left: Jim Gilliam, Johnny Podres, Duke Snider; standing: Don Drysdale, Sam Koufax, Ed Roebuck. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Los Angeles Dodgers baseball players, seated from left: no. 19 Jim Gilliam, no. 2 Johnny Podres, no. 4 Duke Snider; standing: no. 53 Don Drysdale, Sandy Koufax, and Ed Roebuck, posed in locker room at Forbes Field, another version
